ks.common.view

Class CardImages

  • java.lang.Object
    • ks.common.view.CardImages

  • public class CardImages
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for returning images for cards (as well as reverse).

    This class is only responsible for storing images that some other entity has created.

    Calculates card size based on reverseImage.

    For V1.7 moved Loading code out of this class, and into CardImagesLoader. For V2.1 removed static fields and made first-class entity.

    Author:
    George T. Heineman (heineman@cs.wpi.edu)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CardImages(CardImagesLoader cil)
      Create CardImages object with no associated images.
      CardImages(CardImagesLoader cil, java.awt.MediaTracker mt)
      When images are created via media tracker, they must also be removed from the tracker when disposed.

        Parameters:
        cil - loader which had loaded up this deck.
        mt - MediaTracker from which all images are derived.

        img - the image of the given Card object.

      • setCardReverse

        public void setCardReverse(java.awt.Image reverseImage)
        Set the reverse image for a card.

        All calculations for card width, height, and offset are based on this card's dimensions.

        Parameters:
        reverseImage - image for the reverse of a card.

      • setName

        public void setName(java.lang.String name)

        Manually set the overlap to use.

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Disposes of all graphic elements associated with the images.

        Properly synchronizes to avoid concurrent lookup by GUI threads.
